input.title: High Risk: Key Vaults have open network access (AZ-003)
input.body:
# AZ-003: Key Vaults with Open Network Access

## Description
Multiple Key Vaults are configured with open network access, posing a high security risk.

Affected Resources:
- ai-empire-vault-01
- seobaike-vault

## Recommended Action
Restrict network access to these Key Vaults by enabling private endpoints or firewall rules to allow only trusted IPs/subnets.

## Priority
High

input.title: Medium Risk: AI Services have public network access (AZ-004)
input.body:
# AZ-004: AI Services with Public Network Access

## Description
Several AI services are exposed to public network access, which is a medium security risk.

Affected Resources:
- ai-empire-openai-australiaeast
- ai-empire-openai-eastus
- ai-empire-openai-japaneast
- ai-empire-openai-southeastasia
- ai-empire-openai-swedencentral
- ai-empire-openai-uksouth
- ai-empire-openai-westeurope
- ai-empire-openai-westus

## Recommended Action
Disable public network access and configure private endpoints or VNet integration for these services.

## Priority
Medium

input.title: High Risk: GitHub Repository is Public (GH-001)
input.body:
# GH-001: Public GitHub Repository

## Description
The repository is set to public visibility, exposing source code which is a high security risk.

## Recommended Action
Change the repository visibility to private or internal, ensuring only authorized access.

## Priority
High

input.content:
## Azure Security Risks

### AZ-003: Key Vault Open Network Access
- Severity: High
- Affected: ai-empire-vault-01, seobaike-vault
- Root Cause: Default network ACLs allow all access.
- Repair Attempt: Skipped due to lack of write tools; GitHub issue creation failed (403).
- Recommendation: Manually restrict via Azure Portal or CLI with update permissions.

### AZ-004: AI Services Public Network Access
- Severity: Medium
- Affected: Multiple regions (australiaeast, eastus, etc.)
- Root Cause: Public access enabled on Cognitive Services accounts.
- Repair Attempt: Skipped; GitHub issue failed.
- Recommendation: Disable public access and use private endpoints.

## GitHub Security Risks

### GH-001: Public Repository
- Severity: High
- Root Cause: Repository visibility set to public.
- Repair Attempt: Skipped; GitHub issue failed.
- Recommendation: Change visibility to private manually.
